titleStmt.title: Moses message to Pharoah, or God sending to the heads of England go undo the heavy burdens, to let the oppressed go free, to serve Him in the wilderness, that he may do them good in their latter dayes. For Israel shall be many dayes without a king, without a priest, without an ephod, and without a teraphim, afterward they shall look [...]he Lord their God, and David their king, and shall [...]ar the Lord, and his goodness in his latter dayes, ...
titleStmt.author: R. F. (Richard Farnworth), d. 1666.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Tightly bound and cropped, with loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
